title: Emerald Symphony Necklace - A Dazzling Diamond Haaram
materials: Crafted with 18K Yellow Gold and Platinum accents. Features brilliant-cut diamonds (VS clarity
G color) and Zambian Emeralds with a step-cut central stone. Finished with the signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases a contemporary take on the traditional Haaram. The intricate design incorporates diamond-encrusted floral and paisley motifs, enhanced by vibrant green emerald accents. Features a central emerald of impressive size and clarity, surrounded by delicate diamond filigree work. The design culminates in cascading emerald beads for a touch of whimsy and movement.
colors: Primarily white (diamonds) and green (emeralds) with a warm yellow gold base.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaaham)
and high-profile social gatherings. Also suitable as a stunning statement piece for a modern bride.
description: This exceptional Haaram is a testament to superior craftsmanship and design. The harmonious blend of diamonds and emeralds exudes elegance and sophistication. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and durability. It's a modern heirloom piece that will be cherished for generations.
